attributes.action: support a change to the law to add the Duchy of Lancaster to the Freedom of Information Act 2000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Duchy of Lancaster should be as accountable as any other public authority because:

(1) the Chancellor of the Duchy is a Government Minister, and it his role as Chancellor of the Duchy is referred to in the Ministerial Responsibilities for the post.

(2) the Vice­-Chancellor of the County Palatine of Lancaster exercises general supervision over the conduct of 
Chancery business in the North of England.

(3) the Duchy is not subject to the same level of accountability under Criminal law as private corporate 
bodies (see for example Section 228 Planning Act 2008).

(4) the Duchy administers bona vacantia for part of England

...because of these and other public responsibilities the Duchy should be subject to the Freedom of Information Act 2000
